backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister entry point defining an empty actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a completed update to make decorative heart icons fully transparent, with high confidence and referenced components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of all frontend source files and assets used for build planning and documentation.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base body and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document that sets metadata, page title, and mounts the React app to the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that conditionally renders the Valentine question gate or the main Valentine page based on user interaction state.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Playfu: Interactive "No" button that evades the cursor or touch, changes label based on attempts, and becomes clickable after several tries.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Sectio: Reusable layout wrapper that constrains content width and applies consistent horizontal padding using Tailwind utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent React Query queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAvoidingButtonPosi: Hook that computes safe random on-screen positions to move a button away from its current location while staying within viewport bounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive authentication context and provider for Internet Identity, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend data queries are required for this static Valentine application.
frontend/src/index.css: Extended global styles defining a romantic rose-and-cream color palette, typography, dark mode variants, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helper that merges conditional class names using clsx and resolves Tailwind conflicts with tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/valentineCopy.ts: Centralized copy module exporting the recipient name constant used throughout the Valentine app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that initializes React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/ValentinePage.tsx: Renders the main Valentine page with a full-screen romantic background, hero section, and a heartfelt letter personalized using RECIPIENT_NAME. Uses SectionShell, decorative images, lucide-react hearts, and Tailwind styling for responsive, animated presentation.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineQuestionGate: Implements the initial Valentine question gate asking "Will you be my Valentine?" with themed decorations and Yes/No interactions. The Yes button and a playful evasive No button both trigger the onAnswer callback to proceed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines the Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, content paths, plugins, and extensive theme extensions. Includes OKLCH-based color tokens (notably rose/cream), custom fonts, container settings, and radius scales for the romantic design system.
project_state.json: Captures the structured project state and feature inventory for the Valentine app, including frontend, styling, and backend scaffold details. Documents existing features, versions, and a high-level summary of the personalized Valentine experience.
